description: News about National Association for the Advancement of Colored People, including commentary and archival articles published in The New York Times.
title: National Association for the Advancement of Colored People
title_page: National Association for the Advancement of Colored People - The New York Times
maintext:
Before Jussie Smollett Sentencing, His Supporters Ask for ‘Mercy’
A judge must decide whether to send the actor to prison after a jury convicted him last year of falsely reporting that he was the victim of a racist and homophobic hate crime in 2019.
